mapper.insert: insert into schemata (`catalog_name`, `schema_name`, schema_owner, default_character_set_catalog, default_character_set_schema, default_character_set_name, sql_path) values (#{catalogName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{schemaName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{schemaOwner,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{defaultCharacterSetCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{defaultCharacterSetSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{defaultCharacterSetName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{sqlPath,jdbcType=DISTINCT})
mapper.select: select `catalog_name`, `schema_name`, schema_owner, default_character_set_catalog, default_character_set_schema, default_character_set_name, sql_path from schemata
